field_options.name: What type of training is it?
Is this a one time training or does it reoccur?

rows.field_363509: A training for all new hires.
A training aimed at informing the interns about various tools the company has access to.
A training aimed at keeping the attorneys up to date with their continuing education credits.
An overview of new changes to tax law in the given city. Serves as a refresher and an update.
An overview of how one should act in court to best represent the company.
A training that teacher the foundation of tax law. Parts of the national Tax law convention will be played.
A workshop designed at improving employee relationships and highlighting each person's strengths.

rows.field_363568: All staff members regardless of role
